author: acolytec3
content: Here's my first version of an edit for 4844. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7530  I'm not 100% sure if we need a new paragraph specifically for RPC stuff but this first edit just places the `eth_sendRawTransaction` specifics under `Networking` since the transaction level validation is the same as for when txs are received over eth/68

author: acolytec3
content: Basically just borrowed <@388751025789468672> 's specification with very minor edits
